entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and blizzard. Blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blizzard early in the morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
